thread.title: Johnny Depp may star in a time-travel film
thread.title_full: Johnny Depp may star in a time-travel film - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Johnny Depp may star in a time-travel film
text:
Actor Johnny Depp is in early negotiations with Fox to produce and star in Neil Gaiman's time-travel tale "Fortunately, the Milk" with Edgar Wright directing.
READ : Johnny Depp flashes gold teeth at London Film fest
Australia-based Animal Logic Entertainment, best known for The Lego Movie , is producing the live-action and animation hybrid. Zareh Nalbandian from Animal Logic Entertainment is the producer, reports variety.com.
Bret McKenzie, half of the Flight of the Conchords duo, is writing the script, based on Gaiman's children's book. "Fortunately, the Milk" was published in September, 2014 and is narrated by a child.
